responseText: That wasn't too difficult now was it? Cargo is the most basic logistic element, Guild Commodities, and Hunting Lodge Commodities are the two most common types, but you may also pack your own resources into Crates to move more than will fit in your bags. All cargo goes into Packed Crates, which can only be moved using Caravans. Pack your stuff in larger crates to move larger quantities!
name: Node_Caravansary_Helper_6_Response
